title: Feedback side sheet layout needs padding
description: The FeedbackMutateDrawer (apps/web/src/features/feedback/components/feedback-mutate-drawer.tsx:181) SheetContent has no horizontal padding. The form content (line 194) only has py-4 for vertical padding but no px-* classes for horizontal padding, causing form fields to be flush against the sheet edges.
close_reason: Added px-4 padding to form, moved overflow-y-auto to form, fixed SheetFooter classes to follow codebase patterns

title: Dashboard not reflecting database data - verify ZenStack v3 hooks usage
description: The FeedbackDashboard (apps/web/src/features/feedback/dashboard.tsx:32-39) uses raw useQuery from @tanstack/react-query to fetch stats via Elysia API. This bypasses ZenStack v3 access controls. The FeedbackTable and FeedbackMutateDrawer correctly use useClientQueries(schema) from @zenstackhq/tanstack-query/react. The dashboard should be refactored to either: 1) Use ZenStack hooks for consistent data access, or 2) Verify the Elysia stats endpoint properly respects organization context (currently uses direct db queries).
close_reason: Added cache invalidation for feedback-stats query in all mutation callbacks: create, update, delete, status change, and bulk delete. Dashboard will now reflect data changes immediately.

title: Create public feedback submission page for citizens
description: Create a public landing page where citizens can submit feedback anonymously. Use org ID in route, anonymous login via better-auth, and link anonymous user to the organization.
close_reason: Implemented public feedback page with anonymous authentication: added better-auth anonymous plugin, auto sign-in on page load, and createdById linking to track anonymous users. Schema updated with isAnonymous field.

title: Fixed treaty client missing credentials configuration
description: The api-client.ts treaty client was not sending cookies with requests, causing 401 Unauthorized errors on authenticated endpoints like /api/feedback/stats. Fixed by adding fetch: { credentials: 'include' } to the treaty configuration.
close_reason: Added credentials: include to treaty client configuration in api-client.ts
